Class WorldRelation<P>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractSet<E>
        • java.util.HashSet<Pair<World<P>>>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Pair<World<P>>>, java.util.Collection<Pair<World<P>>>, java.util.Set<Pair<World<P>>>

    public class WorldRelation<P>
extends java.util.HashSet<Pair<World<P>>>
    Models a reachability relation between two worlds (see Kripke Models)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
